title: ProHeat 2X® Revolution™ Pet Pro Carpet Cleaner - Commercial 1
description:
Every pet makes a mess. Whether it's tracked-in mud, food spills, or even accidents, the BISSELL ProHeat 2X Revolution Pet Pro Carpet Cleaner handles tough pet messes thanks to the exclusive Pet Pro clean-up system. The system includes CleanShot concentrated pre-treater to remove spots and stains; the 2-in-1 Pet Upholstery Tool to remove pet hair, stains, and odors from upholstery; a trial size BISSELL Professional Pet Urine Eliminator + Oxy; and an EZ Clean Brush Roll Cover to make maintenance of the machine easy. Plus Deep Clean Mode offers powerful cleaning to outclean the leading rental,* and carpets dry in about an hour with Express Clean Mode.** All of this cleaning power comes in a lightweight and maneuverable machine with a low-profile foot that gets under furniture. With the BISSELL ProHeat 2X Revolution Pet Pro, you have everything you need to take on tough pet messes.

ProHeat 2X Revolution Pet Pro Carpet Cleaner CleanShot Pretreater - Integrated pretreater for attacking spots and stains.
3-in-1 Stair ToolFree with bundle purchase. This versatile 3-way tool sprays, scrubs and suctions up dirt and stains from the outer curves, corners and treads of carpeted staircases.
CleanShot® Pretreater - Integrated pretreater for attacking spots and stains.

Adjustable Cleaning Mode - Dries in about an hour with Express Clean Mode** so you can get back to your floors.
Professional Pet Urine Eliminator + Oxy Formula - Removes even the toughest pet stains and odors. Removes pet urine and even skunk odor!

*Deep Clean Mode - Using BISSELL Professional Pet Urine Eliminator + Oxy Formula. Based upon measurements of color reflectance and brightness of carpet fibers compared to the leading rental with their best selling formula.

**Express Clean Mode - Tested on new carpet with protectant. Results may vary.

transcripts: Hi I'm Jenny Bond if you're like me your pets are a part of your family and the fact that they bring hair and stains and odors with them well that's just life. but if you have the Bissell Proheat 2x revolution pet pro it's easy to keep your house clean let me show you. Let's look at some typical messes here is one of those mystery stains that we all have and here we've got some muddy paw print and of course there's a pet accident. But let's not forget about those kids they might drop some food on the floor like this or like this so let's clean. The revolution pet pro has dual dirt lifter power brushes with 12 rows of scrubbing bristles that clean deep down in your carpet and now we're going to pass right over that ketchup this to be a bad stain that ketchup out. Now let's go to the pet stain with Bissell professional pet urine eliminator plus oxy formula, I'm not only removing the stain I'm also removing the strong odor that comes with those inevitable accidents. Now the paw prints heat wave technology combined with the power brushes it's getting rid of those paw prints. Now I'm going to tackle that mystery stain it's removing all the stains from deep down in the carpet fibers, that mystery stain is history.
